item.title: The 3 main reasons why golang is the future of backend development
item.description: The future of development brings many innovations with artificial intelligence, autonomous agents, and dedicated edge hardware. Golang has a short learning curve, consistency across domains, and fast build times â€” three of the main drivers of productivity. (See more in the video below)

item.title: TDC Innovation - Golang in Digital Surgery and Integration with Medical Devices
item.description:
What it’s about

Slides from the TDC Innovation 2021 edition.

On this talk I touched some topics related Digital Surgery and Medical Devices Integration. It explains how we created a FHIR, DICOM and HL7 ADT Integration using plain Go protocols and resources.

The source code can be found here
